languages.text: "Мне и впрямь жаль, что я рожден... От скверной крови. От той же убогой крови, что струится в твоих жилах и жилах твоих рабов. Но таков был замысел, что Бог имел обо мне. И я его исполню".

"Oh yes, I regret that I was born of foul blood — the same wretched blood that flows in your veins and the veins of your thralls. But such was the divine plan for me, and I am willing to play my part."
languages.original_text: "Мне и впрямь жаль, что я рожден... От скверной крови. От той же убогой крови, что струится в твоих жилах и жилах твоих рабов. Но таков был замысел, что Бог имел обо мне. И я его исполню".

traits.locale_text: "I truly regret that I was born of foul blood. The same wretched blood that flows in your veins and the veins of your slaves. But such was the divine plan for me, and I am playing my part."
"I truly regret that I was born of foul blood. The same wretched blood that flows in your veins and the veins of your slaves. But such was the divine plan for me, and I am playing my part."
"I truly regret that I was born of foul blood — the same wretched blood that flows in your veins and the veins of your slaves. But such was the divine plan for me, and I willing play my part."
"I truly regret that I was born of foul blood — the same wretched blood that flows in your veins and the veins of your slaves. But such was the divine plan for me, and I willing play my part."

"Oh yes, I regret that I was born of foul blood — the same wretched blood that flows in your veins and the veins of your thralls. But such was the divine plan for me, and I am willing to play my part."

"Oh yes, I regret that I was born of foul blood — the same wretched blood that flows in your veins and the veins of your thralls. But such was the divine plan for me, and I am willing to play my part."

languages.text: "O ja, ich bedauere, dass ich mit fauligem Blut geboren wurde – dem gleichen verkommenen Blut, das durch Eure Adern und die Eurer Knechte fließt. Aber so lautete eben der göttliche Plan für mich, und ich bin bereit, meine Rolle zu spielen."
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, I regret that I was born of foul blood — the same wretched blood that flows in your veins and the veins of your thralls. But such was the divine plan for me, and I am willing to play my part."

traits.locale_text: "O ja, ich bedauere, dass ich mit fauligem Blut geboren wurde – dem gleichen verkommenen Blut, das durch Eure Adern und die Eurer Knechte fließt. Aber so lautete eben der göttliche Plan für mich, und ich bin bereit, meine Rolle zu spielen."

languages.text: «Oh, sí, lamento haber nacido de sangre mancillada; la misma que corre por tus venas y las de tus esclavos. Pero ese era el plan divino que me esperaba, y estoy dispuesto a cumplir mi papel».
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, I regret that I was born of foul blood — the same wretched blood that flows in your veins and the veins of your thralls. But such was the divine plan for me, and I am willing to play my part."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, sí, lamento haber nacido de sangre mancillada; la misma que corre por tus venas y las de tus esclavos. Pero ese era el plan divino que me esperaba, y estoy dispuesto a cumplir mi papel».

languages.text: 「ああ、そうだ、私は汚らわしい血から生まれたことを後悔している。お前とお前の奴隷の血管を流れているのと同じ惨めな血だよ。しかしそれも私に用意された神の計画で、私はそれを全うするのだ」
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, I regret that I was born of foul blood — the same wretched blood that flows in your veins and the veins of your thralls. But such was the divine plan for me, and I am willing to play my part."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、そうだ、私は汚らわしい血から生まれたことを後悔している。お前とお前の奴隷の血管を流れているのと同じ惨めな血だよ。しかしそれも私に用意された神の計画で、私はそれを全うするのだ」

languages.text: “是啊，没错。我痛恨我身上流着污秽的血液，我和你还有你那些奴隶流着同样的污秽血脉。不过，这就是真神对我的安排，我愿意尽我所能，发挥作用。”
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, I regret that I was born of foul blood — the same wretched blood that flows in your veins and the veins of your thralls. But such was the divine plan for me, and I am willing to play my part."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，没错。我痛恨我身上流着污秽的血液，我和你还有你那些奴隶流着同样的污秽血脉。不过，这就是真神对我的安排，我愿意尽我所能，发挥作用。”

languages.text: « Oh, oui, je regrette d'être né porteur de ce sang ignoble... le même que celui qui coule dans vos veines et dans celles de vos serviteurs. Mais tel est le plan que le divin a conçu pour moi et je suis prêt à jouer mon rôle. »
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, I regret that I was born of foul blood — the same wretched blood that flows in your veins and the veins of your thralls. But such was the divine plan for me, and I am willing to play my part."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, oui, je regrette d'être né porteur de ce sang ignoble... le même que celui qui coule dans vos veines et dans celles de vos serviteurs. Mais tel est le plan que le divin a conçu pour moi et je suis prêt à jouer mon rôle. »

languages.text: "Evet, doğuştan beridir damarlarımda bu iğrenç kanın akması beni üzüyor. Aynı berbat kan, senin ve kölelerinin damarlarında da akıyor. Ancak benim gözümdeki ilahi plan buydu ve bu planda üstüme düşen rolü oynamaya hazırım."
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, I regret that I was born of foul blood — the same wretched blood that flows in your veins and the veins of your thralls. But such was the divine plan for me, and I am willing to play my part."
